document.title: Nanostructure of Hydrated Proton Exchange Membranes for Hydrogen-based Fuel Cells
document.abstract: These images were created by members of the Hydrogen Research Group in the Computational Materials Research Group in the Department of Chemical Engineering at The University of Tennessee, Knoxville. This team has included Dr. David Keffer (UT ChE), Dr. Stephen Paddison (UT ChE), Dr. Brian Edwards (UT ChE), Dr. Shengting Cui (UT ChE), Dr. Bill Steele (ORNL/UT ChE), Myvizhi Esai Selvan (Ph.D. student at UT ChE), Junwu Liu (Ph.D. student at UT ChE), Costas Tsouris (ORNL/Georgia Tech) & Doug Aaron (Ph.D. student at Georgia Tech). Most of the work on this page was done by Myvizhi and Shengting. This work is funded by the U.S. Department of Energy.
